text: @JBellamyTV Don't know why people are complaining about Gov. Kemp opening up movie theaters, gyms, and barber shops. He volunteer Georgia to be a test bed for #coronavirus infections. I'll sit here in California and monitor the situation in the coming weeks. #COVIDー19
